ScribeUI

MapServer Mapfile Development Made Easy

View project onGitHub

About ScribeUI

ScribeUI is a project started by Mapgears, first as an internal tool, and then as a Google Summer of Code project during summer 2013.

Getting help

You can report bugs on the issue list on github.

Questions and discussion should be posted on the mapserver-users mailing list.

License

ScribeUI is released under a MIT-style license. Read it here.
